text: Here's another infographic from distribute's documentation showing that setuptools and easy_install will be replaced by the new hotness—distribute and pip.
pip won't install binary packages and isn't well tested on Windows.
As Windows doesn't come with a compiler by default pip often can't be used there.
easy_install can install binary packages for Windows.
Seriously, I use this in conjunction with virtualenv every day.
